ygData.subject: Re: death
ygData.msgSnippet: On #3, yes, your body will still be there.  I was in the butcherblok mountains on Faydwer and got offed.  It was a long trip so I just signed off for the
ygData.messageBody:
On #3, yes, your body will still be there. I was in the butcherblok mountains on Faydwer and got offed. It was a long trip so I just signed off for the evening. The next night, I made the trip and my body was still there. I have died under water but never found the body. I didn't look to hard because the water was deep and I didn't feel like being fish food.

Phalisha (E'ci Server)

-----Original Message-----
From: Tom [SMTP:bearsfootball@...]
Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 9:33 PM
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: death

From: Tom <bearsfootball@...>

I have some questions about dying:

1) If you die in water can you still loot your corpse?

2) How long will your corpse stay in the game after
you die?

3) Will your corpse remain in the game after you sign
off, and if so for how long?

If anyone could answer these questions I would greatly
apreciate you responding.

Tekman
